description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Mike hears that there is something fishy going on in the military base he once operated on. Taking his daughter with him they go to investigate to find that all the soldiers are dead. Survive with Mike and Alice in this epic shooter and go down in history as the saviours of mankind!
